text: The flag of San Salvador () It is colored blue and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== Name Color HEX Code Blue #0066FF === Historical flags === File:San Salvador Flag.png| Flag of San Salvador (1978â€“2015) ==Related pages== * San Salvador ==References== San Salvador Category:San Salvador San Salvador Category:Flags with coats of arms
